summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PUMA logo text replacement and new team editing feature. All functionality working correctly across all pages.
passed_tests: PUMA text display on Login page (replaces image)
PUMA text display on Admin panel (replaces image)
PUMA text display on Leaderboard page (replaces image)
All headers show '365 RUN CLUB × PUMA × XTRALIVING' format
Edit team button (pencil icon) visible on team cards
Edit team dialog opens when clicking edit button
Edit dialog pre-fills current team members
Edit member names in dialog
Add new member via 'Add Member' button
Remove member via trash icon
Change member gender via dropdown (M/F)
Save button updates team and closes dialog
Cancel button closes dialog without saving
Backend PUT /api/teams/{team_id} endpoint working
Team edit validation (empty names rejected)
Team edit validation (invalid genders rejected)
Edit nonexistent team returns 404
Team cards update after successful edit
Leaderboard still loads and auto-refreshes
Time entry functionality unaffected by team edits
Login/logout flow working
CSV upload and team generation working
Admin panel navigation working

success_percentage.backend: 100% (35/35 tests passed including new team editing)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all PUMA text replacements and team editing features working)
